title: Add source app icon display in queue items
description: EnhancedClipboardItem tracks sourceAppBundleId. Display app icons next to clipboard items to show where content came from.

title: Fix clipboard text display issue in QueueView
description: The text isn't showing in the clip queue view. Need to investigate and fix the display logic. Check the QueueView.swift file for issues with how clipboard items are being rendered. The text content should be visible in each list item.

title: Fix type mismatch: QueueView uses ClipboardItem but QueueManager uses EnhancedClipboardItem
description: QueueView.swift:10 references queueManager.items which doesn't exist (should be queueItems). Also uses ClipboardItem type but should use EnhancedClipboardItem. This causes clipboard text not to display in the UI.
close_reason: Fixed type mismatch and compilation errors. The codebase was already enhanced with many features including NavigationSplitView, categories, pins, source app icons, and advanced settings. Resolved compilation errors by cleaning up duplicate class definitions and fixing access modifiers.

title: Add history view beyond current queue
description: View past clipboard items beyond current queue with search and filters. Should include: full history browser, date-based filtering, content search, source app filtering, and pagination/infinite scroll. Consider grouping by date (Today, Yesterday, This Week, etc.).

title: Add dock icon support with configurable preferences
description: Currently LSUIElement is true in Info.plist which hides the dock icon. Make this configurable via preferences. Users should be able to toggle dock icon visibility from settings without needing to edit Info.plist.

title: Add source app tracking for clipboard items
description: Track and display which app each clipboard item came from. When a clipboard item is captured, record the source application's bundle identifier or name. Display this information in the queue view next to each item. May require accessibility permissions to query active app.

title: Add more customization features to Preferences
description: Expand PreferencesView with: theme selection, max queue size, auto-pin rules, sound effects toggle, custom keyboard shortcuts editor.

title: Update UI to macOS 26 SwiftUI patterns and Human Interface Guidelines
description: Refactor QueueView and PreferencesView to use NavigationSplitView, @Observable (not ObservableObject), and latest SwiftUI patterns from macOS 26 Tahoe.

title: Modernize UI for macOS 26 Tahoe with Liquid Glass effects
description: Update SwiftUI views to use modern patterns, Liquid Glass effects, and follow latest Human Interface Guidelines for macOS 26 Tahoe. Include: visual materials, new control styles, improved navigation patterns, and smooth animations. Test on macOS 26 and ensure backward compatibility where possible.

title: Add separate History view with search and filtering
description: QueueManager already tracks historyItems separately from queueItems. Add a tab or navigation to view full history with search by app, text, date range filtering.

title: Replace UserDefaults with SQLite/Core Data for large-scale persistence
description: Current UserDefaults persistence will not scale to millions of clipboard items. Replace with SQLite (via Core Data or GRDB) or similar for handling large volumes. Should support efficient querying, pagination, and memory-efficient streaming of items. Consider migration path from existing UserDefaults data.

title: Add comprehensive customization settings
description: Add options for: max items in queue, auto-clear interval and rules, theme (light/dark/system), item size preferences, keyboard shortcut customization, and notification settings. Create a proper preferences UI with sections for each category of settings.

title: Add dock icon for ClipQueue app
description: Create proper AppIcon.appiconset with high-resolution icon assets for macOS 26 compatibility

title: Add pin feature for important clipboard items
description: Users can pin important items so they persist and don't get auto-cleared. Pinned items should appear at the top of the queue, have a visual indicator, and exclude from auto-clear rules. Include keyboard shortcut for pinning (e.g., Cmd+P).

title: Expose categories and pin features in UI
description: DataStore already supports categories and pinning but QueueView doesn't show them. Need to add category selection, category assignment UI, and pin/unpin buttons.

title: Add categories feature for organizing clipboard items
description: Users can create categories (e.g., Work, Personal, Code) and assign clipboard items to them. Include category management UI, drag-and-drop or menu-based assignment, and filtering by category in the queue view. Categories should be stored persistently.
